Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We come from Doudiandou Data Technology. Our team is dedicated to the Filecoin field, providing users with solutions for storage, data processing, data encryption, and offering basic hardware infrastructure services. The cumulative computing power of the SPS we have collaborated with exceeds 300PiB and is still increasing. We have rich experience in data packaging and Filecoin node operation and maintenance.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This release consists of simulated data products designed to mimic observations of the same region of the sky as seen by two astronomical facilities: the Nancy Grace Roman Telescope and the Vera C. Rubin Observatory.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use AWS-CLI to obtain the file list from the aws cloud, and then use script commands to save the files to the local server. Package the data into a car file according to the set size without changing the directory structure of the original dataset. It is distributed to SP via hard disk mail and http. Then issue the order through boost.

Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
